body:
Hi,


I've just uploaded radiance 3R9+20090211-1 to Debian/unstable (== based on the
CVS HEAD from 2009-02-11).
As usual it will take a day or two until the packages are built for all
architectures, but amd64 should be available after the next dinstall run.
The package will hit testing in >=10 days, then I'll upload it to backports.org,
too, so it can be installed in Lenny. If somebody needs packages for Etch,
please let me know.


Cheers,


Bernd




 Bernd Zeimetz                           Debian GNU/Linux Developer
 GPG Fingerprint: 06C8 C9A2 EAAD E37E 5B2C BE93 067A AD04 C93B FF79
___
